column1: obituary for lawrence wheeler sines : newman funeral home| lawrence wheeler sines. march 1
column8: 2015 at his home. he was born march 1
column10: md and was the son of the late george r. and hazel m. (keefer) sines. he was also preceded in death by two sisters
column11: delores j. holtschneider and shirley l. kitzmiller; one brother
column13: brian r. tusing. lawrence liked to sit outside under the oak tree
column14: feeding and watching the deer in the back yard. he really enjoyed it when all the kids came for a visit. he worked all of his life as a lumberman. he is survived by his wife of 65 years
